headline.main: WOMEN ASK PLACE AT POST-WAR TABLE; State Federation Calls for the Neutrality Changes and Part in Peace Parleys Later

lead_paragraph: LAKE PLACID, N.Y., Nov. 13 -- Resolutions calling for passage of the Neutrality Act amendments by the House of Representatives and for inclusion of women at post-war peace conferences were adopted by the State Federation of Women's Clubs in the closing session of their annual convention here.
abstract: Dr J Wood on U S stand

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: WOMEN'S CLUBS, N Y S FED OF
